quote: Nothing good is free, and nothing free is good. You want the world to change, you have to force that change behind gun smoke and lead. Blood is the price, always and ever, if you want to buy freedom.
quote_letters: NOTHING GOOD IS FREE AND NOTHING FREE IS GOOD YOU WANT THE WORLD TO CHANGE YOU HAVE TO FORCE THAT CHANGE BEHIND GUN SMOKE AND LEAD BLOOD IS THE PRICE ALWAYS AND EVER IF YOU WANT TO BUY FREEDOM
